TopicTitle: cBBp SPC Pack v0.4: Fixed Failcan RCS and added some adapter pieces. Enjoy.

Articles.Content: wtf... trying ti atach side engines they jsut will nto work. nothing about them is working.

I think i fou8nd a resonable way to get engines on the side. if not the bottom ones will do.

but do to learnign somenew stuff about stacking i will be redoing the RCS for proper parachute implmentation. plus the rc were too big anyway.

K pwarachutes integrated into side cod wise. model needs some work. new rcs looks nicer. not so much of the capsule drilled out.

Think i will change a few things I think i will have room inside for if they ever add life support and power.
glad its working better, that should look pretty swell when its all put together

espeiclly with new integrated parachutes they should be quite the lookes,

shame i willhave to reorganize some things once the power and life support is added

I hope i planned for it accordingly.
I must have an update screenshot.

I must have an update screenshot.

K

As you can see i added something for the parachute to connect to. I also added models for the parachute mortars that eject the things. just having them appear form a black hole annoyed me.

Good thing is the collision boxes keep everything nice and locked together nicely.
Nice!
That\'s some good attention to detail there. Nice job.

You have no idea But i have yet to show anyone the RCS tank yet.

you would think but Nope. Though the heat shield tank and RCS tank weigh more than the top anyway. Which makes sense.
